Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Assist the Swords of Kaia, who are guarding the camp, and eliminate the raging {@LinkCreature:9#100#beasts}. Collect the front paws of the beasts as proof of their deaths.

Operation Target: {@LinkCreature:9#100#tawny sabertooths}, {@LinkCreature:9#200#mugatos}, and {@LinkCreature:9#310#alpha crocutas}.
It's a reward from the federation. Blessings to all the members of the Guild!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
